channel.title: Need Serious Help Understanding Women
channel.description:
So umm hey all... So I'm a freshman in highschool, and recently, in my English class, I see a girl staring at me through the corner of my eye. So umm, I act all chill and that while she like...stares I guess. Then, at home, I decide to send a request to follow her and I wanted to see her reaction or something like that the next day. And it turns out that she declined me and blocked me, so I'm like, okay lul so she doesnt like me. But the next day, she continues to stare at me, and still CONSTANTLY! I'm like WTF in my mind. So, I really want to know whats going on and so I ask my brother and sister Moparists to help me figure out whats going on :confused: :o :P
Note: I look very ugly for a freshman. Note: I am not interested at all in her, but I just want to know why people like her do this.

item.title: Need Serious Help Understanding Women
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:37, topic:546186”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665080.msg4446160#msg4446160 date=1408918289]
Dude. Don’t ask men how to understand women. We don’t.

Either get the balls to ask her what’s up, or don’t.

If she blocked you, then she obviously ain’t trying to play hard to get. If she deleted the request or declined… It could be: she’s playing hard to get, it was an accident, some shit happen, or she ain’t interested.

Again. We don’t know what the hell she is thinking. Only she does.

Also, if you don’t care about her, then why are you so worried about what the hell she does? You obviously have enough care to figure out why she is acting the way she is.

/thread
[/quote]
Or ask Amy. :)[/quote]
Women understand women and they hate each other.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:34, topic:546186”]Grow a pair…go talk to her. You won’t get anywhere in life with women or with goals if you don’t take the first step and just do it.

For that matter, you don’t even have to ask “why you looking at me” You could go up to her right before class and just introduce yourself.[/quote]
L&P is the master of all things women. Listen to his advice.

item.title: Need Serious Help Understanding Women
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:14, topic:546186”]Dude. Don’t ask men how to understand women. We don’t.

Either get the balls to ask her what’s up, or don’t.[/quote]

Both of these are the correct answer. If you’re looking back at her and she’s staring into your eyes for more than just a glance, she’s either planning on how she can isolate you from the herd and kill you, or she’s severely interested in you.

I’ve participated in social experiments on maintaining eye contact with people you either don’t know, or do not know well enough. Pretty much no one can do it unless under certain circumstances, of which is infatuation or the urge to cause discomfort towards the other person.

Too many variables, just ask her if you want the real answer. Don’t bull shit and stumble over words, and say it kindly. If you act like a dick and act aggressive about it, she’s not going to give you a real answer.

Read full topic

@D3i7y wrote:

Personally when this happens it usually means you’re more interested in her than she is in you. maby shes a little slow and stares off into space for a reason. Could be one or the other.

item.title: Need Serious Help Understanding Women
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

If you are sure that she’s staring at you just talk to her. You can maybe do it during lunch break. Make it seem like you didn’t plan it and just start a convesation. Don’t bring up the staring though.

item.title: Need Serious Help Understanding Women
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“AliAbid, post:15, topic:546186”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665080.msg4446160#msg4446160 date=1408918289]
Dude. Don’t ask men how to understand women. We don’t.

Either get the balls to ask her what’s up, or don’t.

If she blocked you, then she obviously ain’t trying to play hard to get. If she deleted the request or declined… It could be: she’s playing hard to get, it was an accident, some shit happen, or she ain’t interested.

Again. We don’t know what the hell she is thinking. Only she does.

Also, if you don’t care about her, then why are you so worried about what the hell she does? You obviously have enough care to figure out why she is acting the way she is.

/thread
[/quote]

Thanks for the advice, and I dont give a ball about women, honestly women to me are the devil, but I was just wondering why she would have done that, and understand people like her in my future observations and thinking.[/quote]
Don’t worry, I’m sure you can find a nice boyfriend. So stop worrying about understanding something you don’t want, and start trying to get what you do want.

Read full topic

If you want to know fucking ask her rofl, what? You can’t ask a legitimate question to someone?

‘Can I help you?’

There, three fine options for asking what the fuck her issue is.
